title: Man found injured in Thornhill
content_html:
Terrace RCMP are investigating after a man was found unconscious with serious injuries in Thornhill, according to an RCMP press release.

Police received the call around 3 a.m. July 7 and found a man, not from B.C., injured near a truck and trailer. The man was transported to hospital.

Police do not suspect foul play currently, the press release states, but they are asking the public for information about the incident.


jake.wray@terracestandard.com
